sn55.47:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nandiyaṃ sakkaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.47:4.3: “catūhi kho, nandiya, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.47:5.2: Idha, nandiya, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.47:5.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.47:5.9: Imehi kho, nandiya, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
